task.title: Send SMS to Email
task.shortdesc: SMS to Email is a feature that allows users to receive SMS in their email inboxes. The SMS sent to the PBX GSM/3G/4G ports will be received first by the system and then forwarded to the users' email inboxes.

prereq.p:
To make SMS to Email work, you need to do the followings:
Install GSM/3G/4G module and SIM card on the PBX.
Check the trunk status and make sure that the GSM/3G/4G trunk is ready.
Make sure the Email setting on the PBX is working.

context.note: Only plain-text SMS messages can be sent to the Email.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Call Features SMS Enable SMS to Email , edit your GSM/3G/4G trunk.

info.note: If no trunk on this page, check if you have installed GSM/3G/4G module on the PBX.

step.cmd: On the SMS to Email configuration page, click to add email address.

info.p: The SMS messages will be sent to the added email addresses.

step.cmd: Select extension account and the bound email address.
Click to add another email address.

taskbody.result: When users send SMS to the GSM/3G/4G trunk number, the PBX will deliver the SMS messages to the selected email addresses.
